app.title: At-Taqwa Foundation
hero.title: At-Taqwa Foundation
hero.subtitle: Youth-led Charity for Our Village
features.title: Our Platform Features
features.subtitle: A comprehensive digital platform designed to streamline charity operations, enhance transparency, and strengthen community bonds.
impact.title: Our Impact
impact.subtitle: Numbers that reflect our commitment to community service and transparent charity work.
events.title: Upcoming Events
events.subtitle: Community Events
events.description: Join our community events and activities. From charity drives to educational workshops, there's always something meaningful happening in our community.
events.noEventsMessage: No events have been scheduled yet.
events.noEventsFiltered: No events match your search criteria.
events.ctaDescription: Have an idea for a community event? We'd love to help you organize it and bring our community together for meaningful activities.
hero_desc: A youth-led initiative to organize donations, monthly fees, and local aid—clearly tracked and reported, so every contribution reaches those who need it most.
support_realtime: Support a cause and track progress in real time.
transparency_desc: Every taka is accounted for. Browse monthly reports with income, expenses, and balances. Export or share with the community.
choose_amount: Choose an amount or enter a custom donation.
receipt_line: Secure • Receipts issued • Zakat eligible options available
generosity_desc: Contribute once or set up a small monthly gift. Track projects, see reports, and stay involved.
auth.welcomeDescription: Sign in to your account or create a new one to join our community and start making a difference together.
auth.signInToContinue: Sign in to your account to continue
auth.createAccountToStart: Create your account to get started
auth.joinCommunityDescription: Join our community of changemakers and start contributing to meaningful projects that make a real impact in our village.
admin.welcomeDescription: Manage your foundation's operations, oversee community activities, and ensure transparent governance of all charitable initiatives.
admin.myProfileDesc: Update your administrator profile, contact details, and system preferences.
admin.manageProjectsDesc: Create, update, and monitor fundraising campaigns with real-time progress tracking.
admin.membershipRequestsDesc: Review and approve member applications to grow our community.
admin.manageEventsDesc: Create, schedule, and manage community events with attendee tracking and notifications.
admin.announcementsDesc: Publish important notices, updates, and community communications.
admin.financialReportsDesc: Upload and manage monthly financial reports for complete transparency.
admin.donationManagementDesc: Monitor and manage all donations from community members and supporters.
admin.monthlyFeesDesc: Track and manage monthly membership fees for all members.
member.welcomeDescription: Manage your membership, track your contributions, and stay connected with our community's activities and charitable initiatives.
member.myProfileDesc: Update your personal information, contact details, and profile photo.
member.monthlyFeesDesc: View your membership dues, payment history, and upcoming payments.
member.myDonationsDesc: Track your donation history and contribute to ongoing campaigns.
member.announcementsEventsDesc: Stay updated with the latest foundation news and community events.
user.welcomeDescription: Manage your profile, view announcements, and stay connected with the At-Taqwa Foundation community.
membership.tellUsWhy: Tell us why you'd like to join our community (optional)
unauthorized.title: Unauthorized
unauthorized.message: You don't have permission to view this page. If you believe this is a mistake, please contact an administrator.
donationPending.thankYouMessage: Thank you for your generous donation! Your contribution has been successfully processed.
donationPending.failedMessage: There was an issue processing your donation. Please try again or contact support.
donationPending.pendingMessage: Your donation is being processed. Please wait for confirmation.
donationPending.initiatedMessage: Your donation request has been received and is being processed.
donationPending.processingMessage: Please wait while we process your donation...
